lo23.data
Class Profile

java.lang.Object
  lo23.data.Profile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Profile is a player's profile. It contains all the information used to identify a player such as his pseudo and his status.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

Profile

public Profile(java.lang.String profileId,
               java.lang.String pseudo,
               char[] password,
               Enums.STATUS status,
               java.lang.String ipAddress,
               javax.swing.ImageIcon avatar,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String firstName,
               int age)
Constructor for the Profile class. Take all the information needed as arguments.

Parameters:
profileId - the unique profile identifier
pseudo - the player's nickname
password - the player's password
status - the player's status
ipAddress - the player's IP address
avatar - the player's avatar (an image)
name - the player's lastname
firstName - the player's firstname
age - the player's age
